name: Waverly Hills
description:
The game consists of three parts, in each part a different part of the hospital. We play through different people's eyes. The other two parts will come later.

 Finally :

This game is my first game and it is purely made for experience. I will improve my game as I improve myself. I'm waiting for your comments, ideas and suggestions about good games.

Controls:

Mouse: Look

WASD: Move

E : Interaction

F : Flashlight
